help_content:
Michaelsoft Mail Sender v1.1.0

Instructions:

1. Configuration
   - Set up your SMTP server information in the "Configuration" tab
   - For common email services, you can click the preset buttons for quick setup
   - QQ Mail and 163 Mail require authorization codes instead of login passwords

2. Sending Emails
   - Fill in recipients, subject, and body
   - Separate multiple recipients with commas
   - You can choose to use HTML format
   - You can add one or more attachments

3. Common Issues
   - If sending fails, check if your SMTP server configuration is correct
   - Confirm that your email provider allows SMTP sending
   - Some email services require enabling SMTP service in email settings

4. About Authorization Codes
   - QQ Mail: Settings -> Account -> POP3/SMTP Service -> Enable -> Get Authorization Code
   - 163 Mail: Settings -> POP3/SMTP/IMAP -> Enable -> Get Authorization Code

For more help, please contact technical support.
